definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The vet may also use an ocular pressure meter for the detection of glaucoma.
sentences.chinese: 职业教育和培训也可用于检测an青光眼的眼压计。

sentences.english: Effective treatments to control eye pressure are available.
sentences.chinese: 现有的一些治疗方法可有效控制眼压。

sentences.english: The correct position of the tonometer in hand provides the measuring accuracy .
sentences.chinese: 眼压仪在手中的正确位置提供测量精度。

sentences.english: Temporary high IOP is the most common side effect.
sentences.chinese: 一过性眼压升高是其最常见的不良反应。

sentences.english: Conclusions Fast mydriasis can not cause the ascension of IOP in adolescents.
sentences.chinese: 结论青少年快速散瞳后不会引起眼压升高。

sentences.english: Increased pressure in the eye is linked to optic nerve damage.
sentences.chinese: 眼压的升高与视神经的损害密切相关。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the cause of intraocular pressure elevation after vitreoretinal surgery(VRS).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究玻璃体视网膜手术术后高眼压的原因。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of intravitreal injection of 4.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察玻璃体腔内注射曲安奈德对眼压的影响。

sentences.english: When operating the Tonometer the battery compartment cover should be tightly closed.
sentences.chinese: 操作眼压仪时电池舱盖应紧闭。

sentences.english: Result: Hyphema disappeared and intraocular pressure became normal after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 结果术后前房出血消失，眼压得以控制。

sentences.english: Measuring of intraocular pressure with the tonometer is permitted only through the eyelid .
sentences.chinese: 本眼压仪仅允许通过眼睑测量眼内压。

sentences.english: Chronic, moderately elevated intraocular pressure(IOP)lasted for 4 weeks and then decreased by trabeculectomy.
sentences.chinese: 动态观察眼压，高眼压维持4周后行双眼小梁切除术。

sentences.english: Chronic, moderately elevated intraocular pressure(IOP)lasted for 4 weeks and then decreased by trabeculectomy.
sentences.chinese: 动态观察眼压，高眼压维持4周后行双眼小梁切除术。

sentences.english: The corneal thickness increased and the injury of endothelium aggravated when intraocular tension increased.
sentences.chinese: 眼压增高者角膜厚度增加，内皮细胞损伤加重。

sentences.english: Being operated from low voltage power supply the tonometer is electrically safe.
sentences.chinese: 低压电源操作，眼压仪电方面是安全的。

sentences.english: Objective To research the influence of central corneal thickness on the measurements of IOP obtained with NCT.
sentences.chinese: 目的讨论角膜中央厚度对非接触眼压计测量值的影响。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
